Articles.Content:
Just wondering if there was going to be any contracts for community created mods?

You know, a contract to map the entire surface of Kerbin or Mun?

Even community created contracts like launching a community created satellite to a specific orbit say for a communications company, or a group of satellites for a GPS over Kerbin?

I hope so

This is the kind of contracts I would love to see.

- Land a specific spot on some planet/moon (and come back)

- Put up a satellite at a certain orbit on some planet/moon

- Map surface using e.g. scansat

- Create a communications satellite network for remote tech

- Establish a base somewhere (in orbit or on a planet/moon)

- Expaind the base

- Fly ressources to the base

etc. etc.

Anyway, I think this is the wrong forum for this post.

-

This thread about mod contracts moved to the mod subforum.

~Claw
